'''Warner Bros. Pictures''' is an American film production and distribution company that serves as the motion picture arm of the {{W|Warner Bros. Motion Picture Group}} division of {{W|Warner Bros.}}, which are both ultimately owned by the mass media conglomerate {{W|Warner Bros. Discovery}}. It is currently one of the five live-action film studios within the Warner Bros. Motion Picture Group, the others being {{W|New Line Cinema}}, {{W|Castle Rock Entertainment}}, and a minority stake in {{W|Spyglass Media Group}}.

Warner Bros. Pictures is the co-production company and worldwide distributor of the 2025 live-action animated film {{AMCM}} and its [[Untitled Minecraft film|sequel]].
